title: Replace or Append Array Value
description: In this lab, we will work on a JavaScript programming exercise that involves replacing or appending values in an array based on a comparison function. Through this exercise, you will learn how to use the spread operator, Array.prototype.findIndex(), Array.prototype.push(), and Array.prototype.splice() to manipulate arrays in JavaScript. This lab will help you improve your skills in working with arrays and functions in JavaScript.

meta.title: JavaScript Array Manipulation | Programming Exercises
meta.description: Learn how to replace or append values in a JavaScript array using the spread operator, Array.prototype.findIndex(), Array.prototype.push(), and Array.prototype.splice().
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Array, Manipulation, Programming, Exercises, Spread Operator, findIndex, push, splice

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in Bash History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 替换或追加数组值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将进行一个 JavaScript 编程练习，该练习涉及根据比较函数替换或追加数组中的值。通过这个练习，你将学习如何使用展开运算符、Array.prototype.findIndex()、Array.prototype.push() 和 Array.prototype.splice() 来操作 JavaScript 中的数组。本实验将帮助你提高使用 JavaScript 数组和函数的技能。

meta.title: JavaScript 数组操作 | 编程练习
meta.description: 学习如何使用展开运算符、Array.prototype.findIndex()、Array.prototype.push() 和 Array.prototype.splice() 在 JavaScript 数组中替换或追加值。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 数组, 操作, 编程, 练习, 展开运算符, findIndex, push, splice

verify.name: 在 Bash 历史记录中验证 Node 命令
verify.hint: 通过输入 'node' 并按 Enter 键，可以在终端/SSH 中运行 JavaScript。
